title: Godâ€™s Limited Edition: Through The Life Of SPB
description: S.P. Balasubrahmanyam was truly a limited edition from God! He was a legend whose magical voice continues to live on in the hearts of his listeners. This book takes you on a journey through his life and musical career, ultimately serving as a tribute to the great S.P. Balasubrahmanyam.
author: Nevin Promod
